title: Gigi Hadid puts on a leggy display in floral frock with thigh-high slit
text:
She recently rocked a 'Boys Lie' sweatshirt set following her split from Bachelor star, Tyler Cameron.

And Gigi proved she was living her best single life on Friday night as she stepped out in a bold ensemble for a dinner party in New York City.

The 24-year-old rocked an Off-White multi-colored maxi dress underneath a black sweater top.

Scroll down for video

Gigi Hadid flashed her incredibly toned legs on Friday night when she stepped out for a dinner party in an Off-White maxi dress that featured a large thigh high slit down the side

Gigi's ensemble featured a blue and green panel frock that had a floral design and high thigh slit.

The Vogue model added a black top and sheer stockings underneath to keep warm for the night out.

She teamed the look with closed toe boots and carried a white purse over her shoulders.

Natural beauty: She styled her blonde tresses back into a slicked back ponytail and sported a natural complexion complete with blushed cheeks and a nude pout

Gorgeous: Gigi's ensemble featured a blue and green panel frock that had a floral design and high thigh slit

Gigi accessorised with a pair of round drop earrings and held her phone in her hand as she walked into the venue.

She styled her blonde tresses back into a slicked back ponytail and sported a natural complexion complete with blushed cheeks and a nude pout.

Meanwhile, sister Bella took to social media to showcase her gorgeous natural beauty.

Bella was across the pond in London for a quick work trip.

'that London light,' she captioned her video selfie.

Stunner: Meanwhile, sister Bella took to social media to showcase her gorgeous natural beauty

Pouting: Bella sported a clear complexion with minimal makeup while drawing attention to her nude plump lips

Bella sported a clear complexion with minimal makeup while drawing attention to her nude plump lips.

And while E! News reported last week that the beauty was back on with her on-and-off-again ex, The Weeknd, the same cannot be said for Gigi and Tyler Cameron.

Gigi was spotted on Thursday leaving a photoshoot in a sweatshirt set that read; 'Boys Lie, Goodbye.'

And perhaps the outfit was a less-than-subtle message to Bachelor star, Tyler Cameron, 26, who she recently called it quits with.

Close: Gigi and Tyler spent most of the summer together. He even attended her grandmother's funeral with her in The Netherlands (pictured in August)

It comes after he told ET last month that he was 'just friends' with Gigi.

'We're just friends," he said at the time.

'I mean... that's just where we're at. Our relationship doesn't need to be public. She's good people, she's an amazing person and we're just keeping it friendly.'

'I'm at the point where I don't really want to talk about my relationships. I've dated publicly, so... I'm trying to date privately and I'm not in love with anybody right now. I'm in love with myself.'

However, Tyler was there to accompany Gigi at her grandmother's funeral over the summer.
description: Gigi Hadid flashed her incredibly toned legs on Friday night when she stepped out for a dinner party in an Off-White maxi dress that featured a large thigh high slit down the side.
